alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 4:59PM CDT until July 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Greene County in east Tennessee... West central Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Eastern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parrottsville, or 10 miles northeast of Newport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported wind damage and radar continues to indicate localized damaging winds are likely. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, Rogersville, Tusculum, Surgoinsville, Parrottsville, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap and Baileyton. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 11 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Unicoi; Washington
